item.title: Recent Bluesky Posts
item.description: Faculty at a Big 10 school with a prominent athletic program here: my retirement (that I signed a contract for) was cut 10% this year. I also have to clean my office with a broken, donated vacuum. But this is nice too, I guess. [contains quote post or other embedded content] (View) Nobody who has to refer to themselves as "highly respected" is [contains quote post or other embedded content] (View)
